value.fullName: Option 1 – 36 month; fixed pricing for 12 months from the Effective Date. Thereafter, Hill-Rom reserves the right to increase annually (not to exceed 3%)
value.label: Option 1 – 36 month; fixed pricing for 12 months from the Effective Date. Thereafter, Hill-Rom reserves the right to increase annually (not to exceed 3%)

value.fullName: Option 2 – 36 month; fixed pricing for 24 months from the Effective Date. Thereafter, Hill-Rom reserves the right to increase in final 12 months (not to exceed 5%)
value.label: Option 2 – 36 month; fixed pricing for 24 months from the Effective Date. Thereafter, Hill-Rom reserves the right to increase in final 12 months (not to exceed 5%)

value.fullName: Option 3 – 36 months; fixed pricing for 36 months from the Effective Date.
value.label: Option 3 – 36 months; fixed pricing for 36 months from the Effective Date.
